reviewText: I really liked the book Intimate Betrayal by Donna Hill; however, the movie was poorly acted and looked amateurish.. The movie cinematography was horrendous and the acting was just okay.. The kiss and intimate scenes could have been left out. I was so so disappointed!
Title: Intimate Betrayal

reviewText: Save yourself some money and buy the book. The movie was no good. Once again I say BET should stick to publishing the books and STOP destroying these authors works by trying  and failing to make movies that are not worth the film they are printed on. Buy the book and wait for the movie to be shown again on tv. You'll be glad you did.
Title: Intimate Betrayal

reviewText: This was a gift to my daughter, she likes this movie. But she did tell me she liked the story and plot.
Title: Intimate Betrayal

reviewText: This movie turned out to be really good. Each time I thought I could predict the ending, but I was way off. Very surprising end.
Title: Intimate Betrayal

reviewText: Monica Calhoun is always gem to watch. This is her story here with help from Calil - good chemistry between both of them, It was believable and I liked the story line which made it easy to watch.
summary: Monica Calhoun shows Intimacy in New Movie!
Title: Intimate Betrayal

reviewText: I wanted to add to my BET movies on DVD collection. Waste of my money. Monica Calhoun and Khalil Kain just didn't have any chemistry with weak acting.
summary: I could have saved my money.
Title: Intimate Betrayal

reviewText: I LOVE THIS MOVIE,IT IS FULL OF SUSPENSE, AND PASSION!I LOVE HOW, THIS MOVIE ENDS!I DON'T UNDERSTAND, WHY IT HAS ONE STAR!
summary: ARE YOU CRAZY? THIS MOVIE IS GREAT!
Title: Intimate Betrayal
